shift_array[source]

shift_array(input_array:ndarray, offset:int)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
import pandas as pd

np.random.seed(0)
array = np.random.rand(100)
series = pd.Series(array)
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
np.testing.assert_allclose(
    shift_array(array, 7),
    series.shift(7)
)
{% endraw %}
